column5: Hi all, I just wanted to stop by quick and say Merry Christmas and I hope Santa is good to you all.  Dave Mercer

Hey dave it was great to see you tonight while christmans shopping,like you said we are down to the wire.....hey bud merry xman to you & your family and good-luck in the new year with everything & your show too,cheers
You have a great Christmas Dave ! I'm not sure if I'm getting anything but a lump of coal... no Mercer present yet anyhow!
Merry Christmas Dave.  Hope you get what you want.  All the best to you and yours.  Joey
Irish you should get it before new year.
Thanks Dave...the best to you and your family as well.
Merry Christmas Dave to you and your Family.All the best in the New Year.P.S keep up the good work on your show it's AWESOME.    Best Regards Dan
ME TOO ME TOO.LOL Best to you and all the Mercer family
